00069 btCollisionWorld::btCollisionWorld(btDispatcher* dispatcher,btBroadphaseInterface* pairCache, btCollisionConfiguration* collisionConfiguration)
00070 :m_dispatcher1(dispatcher),
00071 m_broadphasePairCache(pairCache),

00073 m_forceUpdateAllAabbs(true)

00075 }

00077 
00078 btCollisionWorld::~btCollisionWorld()
00079 {
00080 
00081         //clean up remaining objects
00082         int i;
00083         for (i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
00084         {
00085                 btCollisionObject* collisionObject= m_collisionObjects[i];
00086 
00087                 btBroadphaseProxy* bp = collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle();
00088                 if (bp)
00089                 {
00090                         //
00091                         // only clear the cached algorithms
00092                         //
00093                         getBroadphase()->getOverlappingPairCache()->cleanProxyFromPairs(bp,m_dispatcher1);
00094                         getBroadphase()->destroyProxy(bp,m_dispatcher1);
00095                         collisionObject->setBroadphaseHandle(0);
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00099 
00100 }

00111 void    btCollisionWorld::addCollisionObject(btCollisionObject* collisionObject, int collisionFilterGroup, int collisionFilterMask)
00112 {
00113 
00114         btAssert(collisionObject);
00115 
00116         //check that the object isn't already added
00117         btAssert( m_collisionObjects.findLinearSearch(collisionObject)  == m_collisionObjects.size());
00118     btAssert(collisionObject->getWorldArrayIndex() == -1);  // do not add the same object to more than one collision world
00119 
00120     collisionObject->setWorldArrayIndex(m_collisionObjects.size());
00121         m_collisionObjects.push_back(collisionObject);
00122 
00123         //calculate new AABB
00124         btTransform trans = collisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00125 
00126         btVector3       minAabb;
00127         btVector3       maxAabb;
00128         collisionObject->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(trans,minAabb,maxAabb);
00129 
00130         int type = collisionObject->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType();
00131         collisionObject->setBroadphaseHandle( getBroadphase()->createProxy(
00132                 minAabb,
00133                 maxAabb,
00134                 type,
00135                 collisionObject,
00136                 collisionFilterGroup,
00137                 collisionFilterMask,
00138                 m_dispatcher1)) ;
00139 
00140 
00141 
00142 
00143 
00144 }

00148 void    btCollisionWorld::updateSingleAabb(btCollisionObject* colObj)
00149 {
00150         btVector3 minAabb,maxAabb;
00151         colObj->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(colObj->getWorldTransform(), minAabb,maxAabb);
00152         //need to increase the aabb for contact thresholds
00153         btVector3 contactThreshold(gContactBreakingThreshold,gContactBreakingThreshold,gContactBreakingThreshold);
00154         minAabb -= contactThreshold;
00155         maxAabb += contactThreshold;
00156 
00157         if(getDispatchInfo().m_useContinuous && colObj->getInternalType()==btCollisionObject::CO_RIGID_BODY && !colObj->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
00158         {
00159                 btVector3 minAabb2,maxAabb2;
00160                 colObj->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(colObj->getInterpolationWorldTransform(),minAabb2,maxAabb2);
00161                 minAabb2 -= contactThreshold;
00162                 maxAabb2 += contactThreshold;
00163                 minAabb.setMin(minAabb2);
00164                 maxAabb.setMax(maxAabb2);
00165         }
00166 
00167         btBroadphaseInterface* bp = (btBroadphaseInterface*)m_broadphasePairCache;
00168 
00169         //moving objects should be moderately sized, probably something wrong if not
00170         if ( colObj->isStaticObject() || ((maxAabb-minAabb).length2() < btScalar(1e12)))
00171         {
00172                 bp->setAabb(colObj->getBroadphaseHandle(),minAabb,maxAabb, m_dispatcher1);
00173         } else
00174         {
00175                 //something went wrong, investigate
00176                 //this assert is unwanted in 3D modelers (danger of loosing work)
00177                 colObj->setActivationState(DISABLE_SIMULATION);
00178 
00179                 static bool reportMe = true;
00180                 if (reportMe && m_debugDrawer)
00181                 {
00182                         reportMe = false;
00183                         m_debugDrawer->reportErrorWarning("Overflow in AABB, object removed from simulation");
00184                         m_debugDrawer->reportErrorWarning("If you can reproduce this, please email bugs@continuousphysics.com\n");
00185                         m_debugDrawer->reportErrorWarning("Please include above information, your Platform, version of OS.\n");
00186                         m_debugDrawer->reportErrorWarning("Thanks.\n");
00187                 }
00188         }
00189 }
00190 
00191 void    btCollisionWorld::updateAabbs()
00192 {
00193         BT_PROFILE("updateAabbs");
00194 
00195         btTransform predictedTrans;
00196         for ( int i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
00197         {
00198                 btCollisionObject* colObj = m_collisionObjects[i];
00199         btAssert(colObj->getWorldArrayIndex() == i);
00200 
00201                 //only update aabb of active objects
00202                 if (m_forceUpdateAllAabbs || colObj->isActive())
00203                 {
00204                         updateSingleAabb(colObj);
00205                 }
00206         }
00207 }

00210 void    btCollisionWorld::computeOverlappingPairs()
00211 {
00212         BT_PROFILE("calculateOverlappingPairs");
00213         m_broadphasePairCache->calculateOverlappingPairs(m_dispatcher1);
00214 }
00215 
00216 void    btCollisionWorld::performDiscreteCollisionDetection()
00217 {
00218         BT_PROFILE("performDiscreteCollisionDetection");
00219 
00220         btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo = getDispatchInfo();
00221 
00222         updateAabbs();
00223 
00224         computeOverlappingPairs();
00225 
00226         btDispatcher* dispatcher = getDispatcher();
00227         {
00228                 BT_PROFILE("dispatchAllCollisionPairs");
00229                 if (dispatcher)
00230                         dispatcher->dispatchAllCollisionPairs(m_broadphasePairCache->getOverlappingPairCache(),dispatchInfo,m_dispatcher1);
00231         }
00232 
00233 }

00236 
00237 void    btCollisionWorld::removeCollisionObject(btCollisionObject* collisionObject)
00238 {
00239 
00240 
00241         //bool removeFromBroadphase = false;
00242 
00243         {
00244 
00245                 btBroadphaseProxy* bp = collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle();
00246                 if (bp)
00247                 {
00248                         //
00249                         // only clear the cached algorithms
00250                         //
00251                         getBroadphase()->getOverlappingPairCache()->cleanProxyFromPairs(bp,m_dispatcher1);
00252                         getBroadphase()->destroyProxy(bp,m_dispatcher1);
00253                         collisionObject->setBroadphaseHandle(0);
00254                 }
00255         }
00256 
00257 
00258     int iObj = collisionObject->getWorldArrayIndex();
00259 //    btAssert(iObj >= 0 && iObj < m_collisionObjects.size()); // trying to remove an object that was never added or already removed previously?
00260     if (iObj >= 0 && iObj < m_collisionObjects.size())
00261     {
00262         btAssert(collisionObject == m_collisionObjects[iObj]);
00263         m_collisionObjects.swap(iObj, m_collisionObjects.size()-1);
00264         m_collisionObjects.pop_back();
00265         if (iObj < m_collisionObjects.size())
00266         {
00267             m_collisionObjects[iObj]->setWorldArrayIndex(iObj);
00268         }
00269     }
00270     else
00271     {
00272         // slow linear search
00273         //swapremove
00274         m_collisionObjects.remove(collisionObject);
00275     }
00276     collisionObject->setWorldArrayIndex(-1);
00277 }

00280 void    btCollisionWorld::rayTestSingle(const btTransform& rayFromTrans,const btTransform& rayToTrans,
00281                                                                                 btCollisionObject* collisionObject,
00282                                                                                 const btCollisionShape* collisionShape,
00283                                                                                 const btTransform& colObjWorldTransform,
00284                                                                                 RayResultCallback& resultCallback)
00285 {
00286         btCollisionObjectWrapper colObWrap(0,collisionShape,collisionObject,colObjWorldTransform,-1,-1);
00287         btCollisionWorld::rayTestSingleInternal(rayFromTrans,rayToTrans,&colObWrap,resultCallback);
00288 }
00289 
00290 void    btCollisionWorld::rayTestSingleInternal(const btTransform& rayFromTrans,const btTransform& rayToTrans,
00291                                                                                 const btCollisionObjectWrapper* collisionObjectWrap,
00292                                                                                 RayResultCallback& resultCallback)
00293 {
00294         btSphereShape pointShape(btScalar(0.0));
00295         pointShape.setMargin(0.f);
00296         const btConvexShape* castShape = &pointShape;
00297         const btCollisionShape* collisionShape = collisionObjectWrap->getCollisionShape();
00298         const btTransform& colObjWorldTransform = collisionObjectWrap->getWorldTransform();
00299 
00300         if (collisionShape->isConvex())
00301         {
00302                 //              BT_PROFILE("rayTestConvex");
00303                 btConvexCast::CastResult castResult;
00304                 castResult.m_fraction = resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction;
00305 
00306                 btConvexShape* convexShape = (btConvexShape*) collisionShape;
00307                 btVoronoiSimplexSolver  simplexSolver;
00308                 btSubsimplexConvexCast subSimplexConvexCaster(castShape,convexShape,&simplexSolver);
00309                 
00310                 btGjkConvexCast gjkConvexCaster(castShape,convexShape,&simplexSolver);
00311                 
00312                 //btContinuousConvexCollision convexCaster(castShape,convexShape,&simplexSolver,0);
00313 
00314                 btConvexCast* convexCasterPtr = 0;
00315                 //use kF_UseSubSimplexConvexCastRaytest by default
00316                 if (resultCallback.m_flags & btTriangleRaycastCallback::kF_UseGjkConvexCastRaytest)
00317                         convexCasterPtr = &gjkConvexCaster;
00318                 else
00319                         convexCasterPtr = &subSimplexConvexCaster;
00320                 
00321                 btConvexCast& convexCaster = *convexCasterPtr;
00322 
00323                 if (convexCaster.calcTimeOfImpact(rayFromTrans,rayToTrans,colObjWorldTransform,colObjWorldTransform,castResult))
00324                 {
00325                         //add hit
00326                         if (castResult.m_normal.length2() > btScalar(0.0001))
00327                         {
00328                                 if (castResult.m_fraction < resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction)
00329                                 {
00330                                         //todo: figure out what this is about. When is rayFromTest.getBasis() not identity?
00331 #ifdef USE_SUBSIMPLEX_CONVEX_CAST
00332                                         //rotate normal into worldspace
00333                                         castResult.m_normal = rayFromTrans.getBasis() * castResult.m_normal;
00334 #endif //USE_SUBSIMPLEX_CONVEX_CAST
00335 
00336                                         castResult.m_normal.normalize();
00337                                         btCollisionWorld::LocalRayResult localRayResult
00338                                                 (
00339                                                 collisionObjectWrap->getCollisionObject(),
00340                                                 0,
00341                                                 castResult.m_normal,
00342                                                 castResult.m_fraction
00343                                                 );
00344 
00345                                         bool normalInWorldSpace = true;
00346                                         resultCallback.addSingleResult(localRayResult, normalInWorldSpace);
00347 
00348                                 }
00349                         }
00350                 }
00351         } else {
00352                 if (collisionShape->isConcave())
00353                 {
00354 
00355                         //ConvexCast::CastResult
00356                                 struct BridgeTriangleRaycastCallback : public btTriangleRaycastCallback
00357                                 {
00358                                         btCollisionWorld::RayResultCallback* m_resultCallback;

00368                                                         m_resultCallback(resultCallback),
00369                                                         m_collisionObject(collisionObject),
00370                                                         m_triangleMesh(triangleMesh),
00371                                                         m_colObjWorldTransform(colObjWorldTransform)
00372                                                 {
00373                                                 }

00377                                         {

00380                                                 shapeInfo.m_triangleIndex = triangleIndex;

00384                                                 btCollisionWorld::LocalRayResult rayResult
00385                                                         (m_collisionObject,
00386                                                         &shapeInfo,
00387                                                         hitNormalWorld,

00392                                         }
00393 
00394                                 };
00395 
00396                         btTransform worldTocollisionObject = colObjWorldTransform.inverse();
00397                         btVector3 rayFromLocal = worldTocollisionObject * rayFromTrans.getOrigin();
00398                         btVector3 rayToLocal = worldTocollisionObject * rayToTrans.getOrigin();
00399 
00400                         //                      BT_PROFILE("rayTestConcave");
00401                         if (collisionShape->getShapeType()==TRIANGLE_MESH_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE)
00402                         {

00409                         }
00410                         else
00411                         {
00412                                 //generic (slower) case

00414

00418                                 btVector3 rayToLocal = worldTocollisionObject * rayToTrans.getOrigin();

00473                 } else {
00474                         //                      BT_PROFILE("rayTestCompound");

00476                         {

00573                                         btVector3 localRayFrom = colObjWorldTransform.inverseTimes(rayFromTrans).getOrigin();
00574                                         btVector3 localRayTo = colObjWorldTransform.inverseTimes(rayToTrans).getOrigin();
00575                                         btDbvt::rayTest(dbvt->m_root, localRayFrom , localRayTo, rayCB);
00576                                 }
00577                                 else
00578 #endif //DISABLE_DBVT_COMPOUNDSHAPE_RAYCAST_ACCELERATION
00579                                 {
00580                                         for (int i = 0, n = compoundShape->getNumChildShapes(); i < n; ++i)
00581                                         {
00582                                                 rayCB.ProcessLeaf(i);
00583                                         }       
00584                                 }
00585                         }
00586                 }
00587         }
00588 }
00589 
00590 void    btCollisionWorld::objectQuerySingle(const btConvexShape* castShape,const btTransform& convexFromTrans,const btTransform& convexToTrans,
00591                                                                                         btCollisionObject* collisionObject,
00592                                                                                         const btCollisionShape* collisionShape,
00593                                                                                         const btTransform& colObjWorldTransform,
00594                                                                                         ConvexResultCallback& resultCallback, btScalar allowedPenetration)
00595 {
00596         btCollisionObjectWrapper tmpOb(0,collisionShape,collisionObject,colObjWorldTransform,-1,-1);
00597         btCollisionWorld::objectQuerySingleInternal(castShape,convexFromTrans,convexToTrans,&tmpOb,resultCallback,allowedPenetration);
00598 }
00599 
00600 void    btCollisionWorld::objectQuerySingleInternal(const btConvexShape* castShape,const btTransform& convexFromTrans,const btTransform& convexToTrans,
00601                                                                                         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* colObjWrap,
00602                                                                                         ConvexResultCallback& resultCallback, btScalar allowedPenetration)
00603 {
00604         const btCollisionShape* collisionShape = colObjWrap->getCollisionShape();
00605         const btTransform& colObjWorldTransform = colObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00606 
00607         if (collisionShape->isConvex())
00608         {
00609                 //BT_PROFILE("convexSweepConvex");
00610                 btConvexCast::CastResult castResult;
00611                 castResult.m_allowedPenetration = allowedPenetration;
00612                 castResult.m_fraction = resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction;//btScalar(1.);//??
00613 
00614                 btConvexShape* convexShape = (btConvexShape*) collisionShape;
00615                 btVoronoiSimplexSolver  simplexSolver;
00616                 btGjkEpaPenetrationDepthSolver  gjkEpaPenetrationSolver;
00617 
00618                 btContinuousConvexCollision convexCaster1(castShape,convexShape,&simplexSolver,&gjkEpaPenetrationSolver);
00619                 //btGjkConvexCast convexCaster2(castShape,convexShape,&simplexSolver);
00620                 //btSubsimplexConvexCast convexCaster3(castShape,convexShape,&simplexSolver);
00621 
00622                 btConvexCast* castPtr = &convexCaster1;
00623 
00624 
00625 
00626                 if (castPtr->calcTimeOfImpact(convexFromTrans,convexToTrans,colObjWorldTransform,colObjWorldTransform,castResult))
00627                 {
00628                         //add hit
00629                         if (castResult.m_normal.length2() > btScalar(0.0001))
00630                         {
00631                                 if (castResult.m_fraction < resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction)
00632                                 {
00633                                         castResult.m_normal.normalize();
00634                                         btCollisionWorld::LocalConvexResult localConvexResult
00635                                                 (
00636                                                 colObjWrap->getCollisionObject(),
00637                                                 0,
00638                                                 castResult.m_normal,
00639                                                 castResult.m_hitPoint,
00640                                                 castResult.m_fraction
00641                                                 );
00642 
00643                                         bool normalInWorldSpace = true;
00644                                         resultCallback.addSingleResult(localConvexResult, normalInWorldSpace);
00645 
00646                                 }
00647                         }
00648                 }
00649         } else {
00650                 if (collisionShape->isConcave())
00651                 {
00652                         if (collisionShape->getShapeType()==TRIANGLE_MESH_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE)
00653                         {
00654                                 //BT_PROFILE("convexSweepbtBvhTriangleMesh");
00655                                 btBvhTriangleMeshShape* triangleMesh = (btBvhTriangleMeshShape*)collisionShape;
00656                                 btTransform worldTocollisionObject = colObjWorldTransform.inverse();
00657                                 btVector3 convexFromLocal = worldTocollisionObject * convexFromTrans.getOrigin();
00658                                 btVector3 convexToLocal = worldTocollisionObject * convexToTrans.getOrigin();
00659                                 // rotation of box in local mesh space = MeshRotation^-1 * ConvexToRotation
00660                                 btTransform rotationXform = btTransform(worldTocollisionObject.getBasis() * convexToTrans.getBasis());
00661 
00662                                 //ConvexCast::CastResult
00663                                 struct BridgeTriangleConvexcastCallback : public btTriangleConvexcastCallback
00664                                 {
00665                                         btCollisionWorld::ConvexResultCallback* m_resultCallback;
00666                                         const btCollisionObject*        m_collisionObject;
00667                                         btTriangleMeshShape*    m_triangleMesh;
00668 
00669                                         BridgeTriangleConvexcastCallback(const btConvexShape* castShape, const btTransform& from,const btTransform& to,
00670                                                 btCollisionWorld::ConvexResultCallback* resultCallback, const btCollisionObject* collisionObject,btTriangleMeshShape*   triangleMesh, const btTransform& triangleToWorld):
00671                                         btTriangleConvexcastCallback(castShape, from,to, triangleToWorld, triangleMesh->getMargin()),
00672                                                 m_resultCallback(resultCallback),
00673                                                 m_collisionObject(collisionObject),
00674                                                 m_triangleMesh(triangleMesh)
00675                                         {
00676                                         }
00677 
00678 
00679                                         virtual btScalar reportHit(const btVector3& hitNormalLocal, const btVector3& hitPointLocal, btScalar hitFraction, int partId, int triangleIndex )
00680                                         {
00681                                                 btCollisionWorld::LocalShapeInfo        shapeInfo;
00682                                                 shapeInfo.m_shapePart = partId;
00683                                                 shapeInfo.m_triangleIndex = triangleIndex;
00684                                                 if (hitFraction <= m_resultCallback->m_closestHitFraction)
00685                                                 {
00686 
00687                                                         btCollisionWorld::LocalConvexResult convexResult
00688                                                                 (m_collisionObject,
00689                                                                 &shapeInfo,
00690                                                                 hitNormalLocal,
00691                                                                 hitPointLocal,
00692                                                                 hitFraction);
00693 
00694                                                         bool    normalInWorldSpace = true;
00695 
00696 
00697                                                         return m_resultCallback->addSingleResult(convexResult,normalInWorldSpace);
00698                                                 }
00699                                                 return hitFraction;
00700                                         }
00701 
00702                                 };
00703 
00704                                 BridgeTriangleConvexcastCallback tccb(castShape, convexFromTrans,convexToTrans,&resultCallback,colObjWrap->getCollisionObject(),triangleMesh, colObjWorldTransform);
00705                                 tccb.m_hitFraction = resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction;
00706                                 tccb.m_allowedPenetration = allowedPenetration;
00707                                 btVector3 boxMinLocal, boxMaxLocal;
00708                                 castShape->getAabb(rotationXform, boxMinLocal, boxMaxLocal);
00709                                 triangleMesh->performConvexcast(&tccb,convexFromLocal,convexToLocal,boxMinLocal, boxMaxLocal);
00710                         } else
00711                         {
00712                                 if (collisionShape->getShapeType()==STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE)
00713                                 {
00714                                         btConvexCast::CastResult castResult;
00715                                         castResult.m_allowedPenetration = allowedPenetration;
00716                                         castResult.m_fraction = resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction;
00717                                         btStaticPlaneShape* planeShape = (btStaticPlaneShape*) collisionShape;
00718                                         btContinuousConvexCollision convexCaster1(castShape,planeShape);
00719                                         btConvexCast* castPtr = &convexCaster1;
00720 
00721                                         if (castPtr->calcTimeOfImpact(convexFromTrans,convexToTrans,colObjWorldTransform,colObjWorldTransform,castResult))
00722                                         {
00723                                                 //add hit
00724                                                 if (castResult.m_normal.length2() > btScalar(0.0001))
00725                                                 {
00726                                                         if (castResult.m_fraction < resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction)
00727                                                         {
00728                                                                 castResult.m_normal.normalize();
00729                                                                 btCollisionWorld::LocalConvexResult localConvexResult
00730                                                                         (
00731                                                                         colObjWrap->getCollisionObject(),
00732                                                                         0,
00733                                                                         castResult.m_normal,
00734                                                                         castResult.m_hitPoint,
00735                                                                         castResult.m_fraction
00736                                                                         );
00737 
00738                                                                 bool normalInWorldSpace = true;
00739                                                                 resultCallback.addSingleResult(localConvexResult, normalInWorldSpace);
00740                                                         }
00741                                                 }
00742                                         }
00743 
00744                                 } else
00745                                 {
00746                                         //BT_PROFILE("convexSweepConcave");
00747                                         btConcaveShape* concaveShape = (btConcaveShape*)collisionShape;
00748                                         btTransform worldTocollisionObject = colObjWorldTransform.inverse();
00749                                         btVector3 convexFromLocal = worldTocollisionObject * convexFromTrans.getOrigin();
00750                                         btVector3 convexToLocal = worldTocollisionObject * convexToTrans.getOrigin();
00751                                         // rotation of box in local mesh space = MeshRotation^-1 * ConvexToRotation
00752                                         btTransform rotationXform = btTransform(worldTocollisionObject.getBasis() * convexToTrans.getBasis());
00753 
00754                                         //ConvexCast::CastResult
00755                                         struct BridgeTriangleConvexcastCallback : public btTriangleConvexcastCallback
00756                                         {
00757                                                 btCollisionWorld::ConvexResultCallback* m_resultCallback;
00758                                                 const btCollisionObject*        m_collisionObject;
00759                                                 btConcaveShape* m_triangleMesh;
00760 
00761                                                 BridgeTriangleConvexcastCallback(const btConvexShape* castShape, const btTransform& from,const btTransform& to,
00762                                                         btCollisionWorld::ConvexResultCallback* resultCallback, const btCollisionObject* collisionObject,btConcaveShape*        triangleMesh, const btTransform& triangleToWorld):
00763                                                 btTriangleConvexcastCallback(castShape, from,to, triangleToWorld, triangleMesh->getMargin()),
00764                                                         m_resultCallback(resultCallback),
00765                                                         m_collisionObject(collisionObject),
00766                                                         m_triangleMesh(triangleMesh)
00767                                                 {
00768                                                 }
00769 
00770 
00771                                                 virtual btScalar reportHit(const btVector3& hitNormalLocal, const btVector3& hitPointLocal, btScalar hitFraction, int partId, int triangleIndex )
00772                                                 {
00773                                                         btCollisionWorld::LocalShapeInfo        shapeInfo;
00774                                                         shapeInfo.m_shapePart = partId;
00775                                                         shapeInfo.m_triangleIndex = triangleIndex;
00776                                                         if (hitFraction <= m_resultCallback->m_closestHitFraction)
00777                                                         {
00778 
00779                                                                 btCollisionWorld::LocalConvexResult convexResult
00780                                                                         (m_collisionObject,
00781                                                                         &shapeInfo,
00782                                                                         hitNormalLocal,
00783                                                                         hitPointLocal,
00784                                                                         hitFraction);
00785 
00786                                                                 bool    normalInWorldSpace = true;
00787 
00788                                                                 return m_resultCallback->addSingleResult(convexResult,normalInWorldSpace);
00789                                                         }
00790                                                         return hitFraction;
00791                                                 }
00792 
00793                                         };
00794 
00795                                         BridgeTriangleConvexcastCallback tccb(castShape, convexFromTrans,convexToTrans,&resultCallback,colObjWrap->getCollisionObject(),concaveShape, colObjWorldTransform);
00796                                         tccb.m_hitFraction = resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction;
00797                                         tccb.m_allowedPenetration = allowedPenetration;
00798                                         btVector3 boxMinLocal, boxMaxLocal;
00799                                         castShape->getAabb(rotationXform, boxMinLocal, boxMaxLocal);
00800 
00801                                         btVector3 rayAabbMinLocal = convexFromLocal;
00802                                         rayAabbMinLocal.setMin(convexToLocal);
00803                                         btVector3 rayAabbMaxLocal = convexFromLocal;
00804                                         rayAabbMaxLocal.setMax(convexToLocal);
00805                                         rayAabbMinLocal += boxMinLocal;
00806                                         rayAabbMaxLocal += boxMaxLocal;
00807                                         concaveShape->processAllTriangles(&tccb,rayAabbMinLocal,rayAabbMaxLocal);
00808                                 }
00809                         }
00810                 } else {
00811                         if (collisionShape->isCompound())
00812                         {
00813                                 struct  btCompoundLeafCallback : btDbvt::ICollide
00814                                 {
00815                                         btCompoundLeafCallback(
00816                                                                                    const btCollisionObjectWrapper* colObjWrap,
00817                                                                                    const btConvexShape* castShape,
00818                                                                                    const btTransform& convexFromTrans,
00819                                                                                    const btTransform& convexToTrans,
00820                                                                                    btScalar allowedPenetration,
00821                                                                                    const btCompoundShape* compoundShape,
00822                                                                                    const btTransform& colObjWorldTransform,
00823                                                                                    ConvexResultCallback& resultCallback)
00824                                         : 
00825                                           m_colObjWrap(colObjWrap),
00826                                                 m_castShape(castShape),
00827                                                 m_convexFromTrans(convexFromTrans),
00828                                                 m_convexToTrans(convexToTrans),
00829                                                 m_allowedPenetration(allowedPenetration),
00830                                                 m_compoundShape(compoundShape),
00831                                                 m_colObjWorldTransform(colObjWorldTransform),
00832                                                 m_resultCallback(resultCallback) {
00833                                         }
00834 
00835                                   const btCollisionObjectWrapper* m_colObjWrap;
00836                                         const btConvexShape* m_castShape;
00837                                         const btTransform& m_convexFromTrans;
00838                                         const btTransform& m_convexToTrans;
00839                                         btScalar m_allowedPenetration;
00840                                         const btCompoundShape* m_compoundShape;
00841                                         const btTransform& m_colObjWorldTransform;
00842                                         ConvexResultCallback& m_resultCallback;
00843 
00844                                 public:
00845 
00846                                         void            ProcessChild(int index, const btTransform& childTrans, const btCollisionShape* childCollisionShape)
00847                                         {
00848                                                 btTransform childWorldTrans = m_colObjWorldTransform * childTrans;
00849 
00850                                                 struct  LocalInfoAdder : public ConvexResultCallback {
00851                                                         ConvexResultCallback* m_userCallback;
00852                                                         int m_i;
00853 
00854                                                         LocalInfoAdder(int i, ConvexResultCallback *user)
00855                                                                 : m_userCallback(user), m_i(i)
00856                                                         {
00857                                                                 m_closestHitFraction = m_userCallback->m_closestHitFraction;
00858                                                         }
00859                                                         virtual bool needsCollision(btBroadphaseProxy* p) const
00860                                                         {
00861                                                                 return m_userCallback->needsCollision(p);
00862                                                         }
00863                                                         virtual btScalar addSingleResult(btCollisionWorld::LocalConvexResult&   r, bool b)
00864                                                         {
00865                                                                 btCollisionWorld::LocalShapeInfo        shapeInfo;
00866                                                                 shapeInfo.m_shapePart = -1;
00867                                                                 shapeInfo.m_triangleIndex = m_i;
00868                                                                 if (r.m_localShapeInfo == NULL)
00869                                                                         r.m_localShapeInfo = &shapeInfo;
00870                                                                 const btScalar result = m_userCallback->addSingleResult(r, b);
00871                                                                 m_closestHitFraction = m_userCallback->m_closestHitFraction;
00872                                                                 return result;
00873 
00874                                                         }
00875                                                 };
00876 
00877                                                 LocalInfoAdder my_cb(index, &m_resultCallback);
00878 
00879                                                 btCollisionObjectWrapper tmpObj(m_colObjWrap, childCollisionShape, m_colObjWrap->getCollisionObject(), childWorldTrans, -1, index);
00880 
00881                                                 objectQuerySingleInternal(m_castShape, m_convexFromTrans, m_convexToTrans, &tmpObj, my_cb, m_allowedPenetration);
00882                                         }
00883 
00884                                         void            Process(const btDbvtNode* leaf)
00885                                         {
00886                                                 // Processing leaf node
00887                                                 int index = leaf->dataAsInt;
00888 
00889                                                 btTransform childTrans = m_compoundShape->getChildTransform(index);
00890                                                 const btCollisionShape* childCollisionShape = m_compoundShape->getChildShape(index);
00891 
00892                                                 ProcessChild(index, childTrans, childCollisionShape);
00893                                         }
00894                                 };
00895 
00896                                 BT_PROFILE("convexSweepCompound");
00897                                 const btCompoundShape* compoundShape = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(collisionShape);
00898 
00899                                 btVector3 fromLocalAabbMin, fromLocalAabbMax;
00900                                 btVector3 toLocalAabbMin, toLocalAabbMax;
00901 
00902                                 castShape->getAabb(colObjWorldTransform.inverse() * convexFromTrans, fromLocalAabbMin, fromLocalAabbMax);
00903                                 castShape->getAabb(colObjWorldTransform.inverse() * convexToTrans, toLocalAabbMin, toLocalAabbMax);
00904 
00905                                 fromLocalAabbMin.setMin(toLocalAabbMin);
00906                                 fromLocalAabbMax.setMax(toLocalAabbMax);
00907 
00908                                 btCompoundLeafCallback callback(colObjWrap, castShape, convexFromTrans, convexToTrans,
00909                                           allowedPenetration, compoundShape, colObjWorldTransform, resultCallback);
00910 
00911                                 const btDbvt* tree = compoundShape->getDynamicAabbTree();
00912                                 if (tree) {
00913                                         const ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume) bounds = btDbvtVolume::FromMM(fromLocalAabbMin, fromLocalAabbMax);
00914                                         tree->collideTV(tree->m_root, bounds, callback);
00915                                 } else {
00916                                         int i;
00917                                         for (i=0;i<compoundShape->getNumChildShapes();i++)
00918                                         {
00919                                                 const btCollisionShape* childCollisionShape = compoundShape->getChildShape(i);
00920                                                 btTransform childTrans = compoundShape->getChildTransform(i);
00921                                                 callback.ProcessChild(i, childTrans, childCollisionShape);
00922                                         }
00923                                 }
00924                         }
00925                 }
00926         }
00927 }

00929 
00930 struct btSingleRayCallback : public btBroadphaseRayCallback
00931 {
00932 
00933         btVector3       m_rayFromWorld;
00934         btVector3       m_rayToWorld;
00935         btTransform     m_rayFromTrans;
00936         btTransform     m_rayToTrans;
00937         btVector3       m_hitNormal;
00938 
00939         const btCollisionWorld* m_world;
00940         btCollisionWorld::RayResultCallback&    m_resultCallback;
00941 
00942         btSingleRayCallback(const btVector3& rayFromWorld,const btVector3& rayToWorld,const btCollisionWorld* world,btCollisionWorld::RayResultCallback& resultCallback)
00943                 :m_rayFromWorld(rayFromWorld),
00944                 m_rayToWorld(rayToWorld),
00945                 m_world(world),
00946                 m_resultCallback(resultCallback)
00947         {
00948                 m_rayFromTrans.setIdentity();
00949                 m_rayFromTrans.setOrigin(m_rayFromWorld);
00950                 m_rayToTrans.setIdentity();
00951                 m_rayToTrans.setOrigin(m_rayToWorld);
00952 
00953                 btVector3 rayDir = (rayToWorld-rayFromWorld);
00954 
00955                 rayDir.normalize ();
00957                 m_rayDirectionInverse[0] = rayDir[0] == btScalar(0.0) ? btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT) : btScalar(1.0) / rayDir[0];
00958                 m_rayDirectionInverse[1] = rayDir[1] == btScalar(0.0) ? btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT) : btScalar(1.0) / rayDir[1];
00959                 m_rayDirectionInverse[2] = rayDir[2] == btScalar(0.0) ? btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT) : btScalar(1.0) / rayDir[2];
00960                 m_signs[0] = m_rayDirectionInverse[0] < 0.0;
00961                 m_signs[1] = m_rayDirectionInverse[1] < 0.0;
00962                 m_signs[2] = m_rayDirectionInverse[2] < 0.0;
00963 
00964                 m_lambda_max = rayDir.dot(m_rayToWorld-m_rayFromWorld);
00965 
00966         }
00967 
00968 
00969 
00970         virtual bool    process(const btBroadphaseProxy* proxy)
00971         {
00973                 if (m_resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction == btScalar(0.f))
00974                         return false;
00975 
00976                 btCollisionObject*      collisionObject = (btCollisionObject*)proxy->m_clientObject;
00977 
00978                 //only perform raycast if filterMask matches
00979                 if(m_resultCallback.needsCollision(collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle())) 
00980                 {
00981                         //RigidcollisionObject* collisionObject = ctrl->GetRigidcollisionObject();
00982                         //btVector3 collisionObjectAabbMin,collisionObjectAabbMax;
00983 #if 0
00984 #ifdef RECALCULATE_AABB
00985                         btVector3 collisionObjectAabbMin,collisionObjectAabbMax;
00986                         collisionObject->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(collisionObject->getWorldTransform(),collisionObjectAabbMin,collisionObjectAabbMax);
00987 #else
00988                         //getBroadphase()->getAabb(collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle(),collisionObjectAabbMin,collisionObjectAabbMax);
00989                         const btVector3& collisionObjectAabbMin = collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle()->m_aabbMin;
00990                         const btVector3& collisionObjectAabbMax = collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle()->m_aabbMax;
00991 #endif
00992 #endif
00993                         //btScalar hitLambda = m_resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction;
00994                         //culling already done by broadphase
00995                         //if (btRayAabb(m_rayFromWorld,m_rayToWorld,collisionObjectAabbMin,collisionObjectAabbMax,hitLambda,m_hitNormal))
00996                         {
00997                                 m_world->rayTestSingle(m_rayFromTrans,m_rayToTrans,
00998                                         collisionObject,
00999                                         collisionObject->getCollisionShape(),
01000                                         collisionObject->getWorldTransform(),
01001                                         m_resultCallback);
01002                         }
01003                 }
01004                 return true;
01005         }
01006 };
01007 
01008 void    btCollisionWorld::rayTest(const btVector3& rayFromWorld, const btVector3& rayToWorld, RayResultCallback& resultCallback) const
01009 {
01010         //BT_PROFILE("rayTest");
01013         btSingleRayCallback rayCB(rayFromWorld,rayToWorld,this,resultCallback);
01014 
01015 #ifndef USE_BRUTEFORCE_RAYBROADPHASE
01016         m_broadphasePairCache->rayTest(rayFromWorld,rayToWorld,rayCB);
01017 #else
01018         for (int i=0;i<this->getNumCollisionObjects();i++)
01019         {
01020                 rayCB.process(m_collisionObjects[i]->getBroadphaseHandle());
01021         }       
01022 #endif //USE_BRUTEFORCE_RAYBROADPHASE
01023 
01024 }

01026 
01027 struct btSingleSweepCallback : public btBroadphaseRayCallback
01028 {
01029 
01030         btTransform     m_convexFromTrans;
01031         btTransform     m_convexToTrans;
01032         btVector3       m_hitNormal;
01033         const btCollisionWorld* m_world;
01034         btCollisionWorld::ConvexResultCallback& m_resultCallback;
01035         btScalar        m_allowedCcdPenetration;
01036         const btConvexShape* m_castShape;
01037 
01038 
01039         btSingleSweepCallback(const btConvexShape* castShape, const btTransform& convexFromTrans,const btTransform& convexToTrans,const btCollisionWorld* world,btCollisionWorld::ConvexResultCallback& resultCallback,btScalar allowedPenetration)
01040                 :m_convexFromTrans(convexFromTrans),
01041                 m_convexToTrans(convexToTrans),
01042                 m_world(world),
01043                 m_resultCallback(resultCallback),
01044                 m_allowedCcdPenetration(allowedPenetration),
01045                 m_castShape(castShape)
01046         {
01047                 btVector3 unnormalizedRayDir = (m_convexToTrans.getOrigin()-m_convexFromTrans.getOrigin());
01048                 btVector3 rayDir = unnormalizedRayDir.normalized();
01050                 m_rayDirectionInverse[0] = rayDir[0] == btScalar(0.0) ? btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT) : btScalar(1.0) / rayDir[0];
01051                 m_rayDirectionInverse[1] = rayDir[1] == btScalar(0.0) ? btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT) : btScalar(1.0) / rayDir[1];
01052                 m_rayDirectionInverse[2] = rayDir[2] == btScalar(0.0) ? btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT) : btScalar(1.0) / rayDir[2];
01053                 m_signs[0] = m_rayDirectionInverse[0] < 0.0;
01054                 m_signs[1] = m_rayDirectionInverse[1] < 0.0;
01055                 m_signs[2] = m_rayDirectionInverse[2] < 0.0;
01056 
01057                 m_lambda_max = rayDir.dot(unnormalizedRayDir);
01058 
01059         }
01060 
01061         virtual bool    process(const btBroadphaseProxy* proxy)
01062         {
01064                 if (m_resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction == btScalar(0.f))
01065                         return false;
01066 
01067                 btCollisionObject*      collisionObject = (btCollisionObject*)proxy->m_clientObject;
01068 
01069                 //only perform raycast if filterMask matches
01070                 if(m_resultCallback.needsCollision(collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle())) {
01071                         //RigidcollisionObject* collisionObject = ctrl->GetRigidcollisionObject();
01072                         m_world->objectQuerySingle(m_castShape, m_convexFromTrans,m_convexToTrans,
01073                                 collisionObject,
01074                                 collisionObject->getCollisionShape(),
01075                                 collisionObject->getWorldTransform(),
01076                                 m_resultCallback,
01077                                 m_allowedCcdPenetration);
01078                 }
01079 
01080                 return true;
01081         }
01082 };
01083 
01084 
01085 
01086 void    btCollisionWorld::convexSweepTest(const btConvexShape* castShape, const btTransform& convexFromWorld, const btTransform& convexToWorld, ConvexResultCallback& resultCallback, btScalar allowedCcdPenetration) const
01087 {
01088 
01089         BT_PROFILE("convexSweepTest");
01093 
01094 
01095 
01096         btTransform     convexFromTrans,convexToTrans;
01097         convexFromTrans = convexFromWorld;
01098         convexToTrans = convexToWorld;
01099         btVector3 castShapeAabbMin, castShapeAabbMax;
01100         /* Compute AABB that encompasses angular movement */
01101         {
01102                 btVector3 linVel, angVel;
01103                 btTransformUtil::calculateVelocity (convexFromTrans, convexToTrans, 1.0f, linVel, angVel);
01104                 btVector3 zeroLinVel;
01105                 zeroLinVel.setValue(0,0,0);
01106                 btTransform R;
01107                 R.setIdentity ();
01108                 R.setRotation (convexFromTrans.getRotation());
01109                 castShape->calculateTemporalAabb (R, zeroLinVel, angVel, 1.0f, castShapeAabbMin, castShapeAabbMax);
01110         }
01111 
01112 #ifndef USE_BRUTEFORCE_RAYBROADPHASE
01113 
01114         btSingleSweepCallback   convexCB(castShape,convexFromWorld,convexToWorld,this,resultCallback,allowedCcdPenetration);
01115 
01116         m_broadphasePairCache->rayTest(convexFromTrans.getOrigin(),convexToTrans.getOrigin(),convexCB,castShapeAabbMin,castShapeAabbMax);
01117 
01118 #else
01120         // do a ray-shape query using convexCaster (CCD)
01121         int i;
01122         for (i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
01123         {
01124                 btCollisionObject*      collisionObject= m_collisionObjects[i];
01125                 //only perform raycast if filterMask matches
01126                 if(resultCallback.needsCollision(collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle())) {
01127                         //RigidcollisionObject* collisionObject = ctrl->GetRigidcollisionObject();
01128                         btVector3 collisionObjectAabbMin,collisionObjectAabbMax;
01129                         collisionObject->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(collisionObject->getWorldTransform(),collisionObjectAabbMin,collisionObjectAabbMax);
01130                         AabbExpand (collisionObjectAabbMin, collisionObjectAabbMax, castShapeAabbMin, castShapeAabbMax);
01131                         btScalar hitLambda = btScalar(1.); //could use resultCallback.m_closestHitFraction, but needs testing
01132                         btVector3 hitNormal;
01133                         if (btRayAabb(convexFromWorld.getOrigin(),convexToWorld.getOrigin(),collisionObjectAabbMin,collisionObjectAabbMax,hitLambda,hitNormal))
01134                         {
01135                                 objectQuerySingle(castShape, convexFromTrans,convexToTrans,
01136                                         collisionObject,
01137                                         collisionObject->getCollisionShape(),
01138                                         collisionObject->getWorldTransform(),
01139                                         resultCallback,
01140                                         allowedCcdPenetration);
01141                         }
01142                 }
01143         }
01144 #endif //USE_BRUTEFORCE_RAYBROADPHASE
01145 }
01146 
01147 
01148 
01149 struct btBridgedManifoldResult : public btManifoldResult
01150 {
01151 
01152         btCollisionWorld::ContactResultCallback&        m_resultCallback;
01153 
01154         btBridgedManifoldResult( const btCollisionObjectWrapper* obj0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* obj1Wrap,btCollisionWorld::ContactResultCallback& resultCallback )
01155                 :btManifoldResult(obj0Wrap,obj1Wrap),
01156                 m_resultCallback(resultCallback)
01157         {
01158         }
01159 
01160         virtual void addContactPoint(const btVector3& normalOnBInWorld,const btVector3& pointInWorld,btScalar depth)
01161         {
01162                 bool isSwapped = m_manifoldPtr->getBody0() != m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject();
01163                 btVector3 pointA = pointInWorld + normalOnBInWorld * depth;
01164                 btVector3 localA;
01165                 btVector3 localB;
01166                 if (isSwapped)
01167                 {
01168                         localA = m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getWorldTransform().invXform(pointA );
01169                         localB = m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getWorldTransform().invXform(pointInWorld);
01170                 } else
01171                 {
01172                         localA = m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getWorldTransform().invXform(pointA );
01173                         localB = m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getWorldTransform().invXform(pointInWorld);
01174                 }
01175                 
01176                 btManifoldPoint newPt(localA,localB,normalOnBInWorld,depth);
01177                 newPt.m_positionWorldOnA = pointA;
01178                 newPt.m_positionWorldOnB = pointInWorld;
01179                 
01180            //BP mod, store contact triangles.
01181                 if (isSwapped)
01182                 {
01183                         newPt.m_partId0 = m_partId1;
01184                         newPt.m_partId1 = m_partId0;
01185                         newPt.m_index0  = m_index1;
01186                         newPt.m_index1  = m_index0;
01187                 } else
01188                 {
01189                         newPt.m_partId0 = m_partId0;
01190                         newPt.m_partId1 = m_partId1;
01191                         newPt.m_index0  = m_index0;
01192                         newPt.m_index1  = m_index1;
01193                 }
01194 
01195                 //experimental feature info, for per-triangle material etc.
01196                 const btCollisionObjectWrapper* obj0Wrap = isSwapped? m_body1Wrap : m_body0Wrap;
01197                 const btCollisionObjectWrapper* obj1Wrap = isSwapped? m_body0Wrap : m_body1Wrap;
01198                 m_resultCallback.addSingleResult(newPt,obj0Wrap,newPt.m_partId0,newPt.m_index0,obj1Wrap,newPt.m_partId1,newPt.m_index1);
01199 
01200         }
01201         
01202 };
01203 
01204 
01205 
01206 struct btSingleContactCallback : public btBroadphaseAabbCallback
01207 {
01208 
01209         btCollisionObject* m_collisionObject;
01210         btCollisionWorld*       m_world;
01211         btCollisionWorld::ContactResultCallback&        m_resultCallback;
01212         
01213         
01214         btSingleContactCallback(btCollisionObject* collisionObject, btCollisionWorld* world,btCollisionWorld::ContactResultCallback& resultCallback)
01215                 :m_collisionObject(collisionObject),
01216                 m_world(world),
01217                 m_resultCallback(resultCallback)
01218         {
01219         }
01220 
01221         virtual bool    process(const btBroadphaseProxy* proxy)
01222         {
01223                 btCollisionObject*      collisionObject = (btCollisionObject*)proxy->m_clientObject;
01224                 if (collisionObject == m_collisionObject)
01225                         return true;
01226 
01227                 //only perform raycast if filterMask matches
01228                 if(m_resultCallback.needsCollision(collisionObject->getBroadphaseHandle())) 
01229                 {
01230                         btCollisionObjectWrapper ob0(0,m_collisionObject->getCollisionShape(),m_collisionObject,m_collisionObject->getWorldTransform(),-1,-1);
01231                         btCollisionObjectWrapper ob1(0,collisionObject->getCollisionShape(),collisionObject,collisionObject->getWorldTransform(),-1,-1);
01232 
01233                         btCollisionAlgorithm* algorithm = m_world->getDispatcher()->findAlgorithm(&ob0,&ob1,0, BT_CLOSEST_POINT_ALGORITHMS);
01234                         if (algorithm)
01235                         {
01236                                 btBridgedManifoldResult contactPointResult(&ob0,&ob1, m_resultCallback);
01237                                 //discrete collision detection query
01238                                 
01239                                 algorithm->processCollision(&ob0,&ob1, m_world->getDispatchInfo(),&contactPointResult);
01240 
01241                                 algorithm->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
01242                                 m_world->getDispatcher()->freeCollisionAlgorithm(algorithm);
01243                         }
01244                 }
01245                 return true;
01246         }
01247 };
01248 
01249 
01252 void    btCollisionWorld::contactTest( btCollisionObject* colObj, ContactResultCallback& resultCallback)
01253 {
01254         btVector3 aabbMin,aabbMax;
01255         colObj->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(colObj->getWorldTransform(),aabbMin,aabbMax);
01256         btSingleContactCallback contactCB(colObj,this,resultCallback);
01257         
01258         m_broadphasePairCache->aabbTest(aabbMin,aabbMax,contactCB);
01259 }
01260 
01261 
01264 void    btCollisionWorld::contactPairTest(btCollisionObject* colObjA, btCollisionObject* colObjB, ContactResultCallback& resultCallback)
01265 {
01266         btCollisionObjectWrapper obA(0,colObjA->getCollisionShape(),colObjA,colObjA->getWorldTransform(),-1,-1);
01267         btCollisionObjectWrapper obB(0,colObjB->getCollisionShape(),colObjB,colObjB->getWorldTransform(),-1,-1);
01268 
01269         btCollisionAlgorithm* algorithm = getDispatcher()->findAlgorithm(&obA,&obB, 0, BT_CLOSEST_POINT_ALGORITHMS);
01270         if (algorithm)
01271         {
01272                 btBridgedManifoldResult contactPointResult(&obA,&obB, resultCallback);
01273                 contactPointResult.m_closestPointDistanceThreshold = resultCallback.m_closestDistanceThreshold;
01274                 //discrete collision detection query
01275                 algorithm->processCollision(&obA,&obB, getDispatchInfo(),&contactPointResult);
01276 
01277                 algorithm->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
01278                 getDispatcher()->freeCollisionAlgorithm(algorithm);
01279         }
01280 
01281 }

01285 
01286 class DebugDrawcallback : public btTriangleCallback, public btInternalTriangleIndexCallback
01287 {
01288         btIDebugDraw*   m_debugDrawer;
01289         btVector3       m_color;
01290         btTransform     m_worldTrans;
01291 
01292 public:
01293 
01294         DebugDrawcallback(btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer,const btTransform& worldTrans,const btVector3& color) :
01295           m_debugDrawer(debugDrawer),
01296                   m_color(color),
01297                   m_worldTrans(worldTrans)
01298           {
01299           }
01300 
01301           virtual void internalProcessTriangleIndex(btVector3* triangle,int partId,int  triangleIndex)
01302           {
01303                   processTriangle(triangle,partId,triangleIndex);
01304           }
01305 
01306           virtual void processTriangle(btVector3* triangle,int partId, int triangleIndex)
01307           {
01308                   (void)partId;
01309                   (void)triangleIndex;
01310 
01311                   btVector3 wv0,wv1,wv2;
01312                   wv0 = m_worldTrans*triangle[0];
01313                   wv1 = m_worldTrans*triangle[1];
01314                   wv2 = m_worldTrans*triangle[2];
01315                   btVector3 center = (wv0+wv1+wv2)*btScalar(1./3.);
01316           
01317           if (m_debugDrawer->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawNormals )
01318           {
01319                     btVector3 normal = (wv1-wv0).cross(wv2-wv0);
01320                     normal.normalize();
01321                     btVector3 normalColor(1,1,0);
01322                     m_debugDrawer->drawLine(center,center+normal,normalColor);
01323           }
01324                   m_debugDrawer->drawLine(wv0,wv1,m_color);
01325                   m_debugDrawer->drawLine(wv1,wv2,m_color);
01326                   m_debugDrawer->drawLine(wv2,wv0,m_color);
01327           }
01328 };

01330 
01331 void btCollisionWorld::debugDrawObject(const btTransform& worldTransform, const btCollisionShape* shape, const btVector3& color)
01332 {
01333         // Draw a small simplex at the center of the object
01334         if (getDebugDrawer() && getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawFrames)
01335         {
01336                 getDebugDrawer()->drawTransform(worldTransform,.1);
01337         }
01338 
01339         if (shape->getShapeType() == COMPOUND_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE)
01340         {
01341                 const btCompoundShape* compoundShape = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(shape);
01342                 for (int i=compoundShape->getNumChildShapes()-1;i>=0;i--)
01343                 {
01344                         btTransform childTrans = compoundShape->getChildTransform(i);
01345                         const btCollisionShape* colShape = compoundShape->getChildShape(i);
01346                         debugDrawObject(worldTransform*childTrans,colShape,color);
01347                 }
01348 
01349         } else
01350         {
01351 
01352         switch (shape->getShapeType())
01353         {
01354 
01355         case BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE:
01356             {
01357                 const btBoxShape* boxShape = static_cast<const btBoxShape*>(shape);
01358                 btVector3 halfExtents = boxShape->getHalfExtentsWithMargin();
01359                 getDebugDrawer()->drawBox(-halfExtents,halfExtents,worldTransform,color);
01360                 break;
01361             }
01362 
01363         case SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE:
01364             {
01365                 const btSphereShape* sphereShape = static_cast<const btSphereShape*>(shape);
01366                 btScalar radius = sphereShape->getMargin();//radius doesn't include the margin, so draw with margin
01367 
01368                 getDebugDrawer()->drawSphere(radius, worldTransform, color);
01369                 break;
01370             }
01371         case MULTI_SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE:
01372             {
01373                 const btMultiSphereShape* multiSphereShape = static_cast<const btMultiSphereShape*>(shape);
01374 
01375                 btTransform childTransform;
01376                 childTransform.setIdentity();
01377 
01378                 for (int i = multiSphereShape->getSphereCount()-1; i>=0;i--)
01379                 {
01380                     childTransform.setOrigin(multiSphereShape->getSpherePosition(i));
01381                     getDebugDrawer()->drawSphere(multiSphereShape->getSphereRadius(i), worldTransform*childTransform, color);
01382                 }
01383 
01384                 break;
01385             }
01386         case CAPSULE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE:
01387             {
01388                 const btCapsuleShape* capsuleShape = static_cast<const btCapsuleShape*>(shape);
01389 
01390                 btScalar radius = capsuleShape->getRadius();
01391                 btScalar halfHeight = capsuleShape->getHalfHeight();
01392 
01393                 int upAxis = capsuleShape->getUpAxis();
01394                 getDebugDrawer()->drawCapsule(radius, halfHeight, upAxis, worldTransform, color);
01395                 break;
01396             }
01397         case CONE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE:
01398             {
01399                 const btConeShape* coneShape = static_cast<const btConeShape*>(shape);
01400                 btScalar radius = coneShape->getRadius();//+coneShape->getMargin();
01401                 btScalar height = coneShape->getHeight();//+coneShape->getMargin();
01402 
01403                 int upAxis= coneShape->getConeUpIndex();
01404                 getDebugDrawer()->drawCone(radius, height, upAxis, worldTransform, color);
01405                 break;
01406 
01407             }
01408         case CYLINDER_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE:
01409             {
01410                 const btCylinderShape* cylinder = static_cast<const btCylinderShape*>(shape);
01411                 int upAxis = cylinder->getUpAxis();
01412                 btScalar radius = cylinder->getRadius();
01413                 btScalar halfHeight = cylinder->getHalfExtentsWithMargin()[upAxis];
01414                 getDebugDrawer()->drawCylinder(radius, halfHeight, upAxis, worldTransform, color);
01415                 break;
01416             }
01417 
01418         case STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE:
01419             {
01420                 const btStaticPlaneShape* staticPlaneShape = static_cast<const btStaticPlaneShape*>(shape);
01421                 btScalar planeConst = staticPlaneShape->getPlaneConstant();
01422                 const btVector3& planeNormal = staticPlaneShape->getPlaneNormal();
01423                 getDebugDrawer()->drawPlane(planeNormal, planeConst,worldTransform, color);
01424                 break;
01425 
01426             }
01427         default:
01428             {
01429 
01431                 if (shape->isPolyhedral())
01432                 {
01433                     btPolyhedralConvexShape* polyshape = (btPolyhedralConvexShape*) shape;
01434                     
01435                     int i;
01436                     if (polyshape->getConvexPolyhedron())
01437                     {
01438                         const btConvexPolyhedron* poly = polyshape->getConvexPolyhedron();
01439                         for (i=0;i<poly->m_faces.size();i++)
01440                         {
01441                             btVector3 centroid(0,0,0);
01442                             int numVerts = poly->m_faces[i].m_indices.size();
01443                             if (numVerts)
01444                             {
01445                                 int lastV = poly->m_faces[i].m_indices[numVerts-1];
01446                                 for (int v=0;v<poly->m_faces[i].m_indices.size();v++)
01447                                 {
01448                                     int curVert = poly->m_faces[i].m_indices[v];
01449                                     centroid+=poly->m_vertices[curVert];
01450                                     getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(worldTransform*poly->m_vertices[lastV],worldTransform*poly->m_vertices[curVert],color);
01451                                     lastV = curVert;
01452                                 }
01453                             }
01454                             centroid*= btScalar(1.f)/btScalar(numVerts);
01455                             if (getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawNormals)
01456                             {
01457                                 btVector3 normalColor(1,1,0);
01458                                 btVector3 faceNormal(poly->m_faces[i].m_plane[0],poly->m_faces[i].m_plane[1],poly->m_faces[i].m_plane[2]);
01459                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(worldTransform*centroid,worldTransform*(centroid+faceNormal),normalColor);
01460                             }
01461                             
01462                         }
01463                         
01464                         
01465                     } else
01466                     {
01467                         for (i=0;i<polyshape->getNumEdges();i++)
01468                         {
01469                             btVector3 a,b;
01470                             polyshape->getEdge(i,a,b);
01471                             btVector3 wa = worldTransform * a;
01472                             btVector3 wb = worldTransform * b;
01473                             getDebugDrawer()->drawLine(wa,wb,color);
01474                         }
01475                     }
01476                     
01477                     
01478                 }
01479                     
01480                 if (shape->isConcave())
01481                 {
01482                     btConcaveShape* concaveMesh = (btConcaveShape*) shape;
01483 
01485                     btVector3 aabbMax(btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT));
01486                     btVector3 aabbMin(btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT));
01487 
01488                     DebugDrawcallback drawCallback(getDebugDrawer(),worldTransform,color);
01489                     concaveMesh->processAllTriangles(&drawCallback,aabbMin,aabbMax);
01490 
01491                 }
01492 
01493                 if (shape->getShapeType() == CONVEX_TRIANGLEMESH_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE)
01494                 {
01495                     btConvexTriangleMeshShape* convexMesh = (btConvexTriangleMeshShape*) shape;
01496                     //todo: pass camera for some culling                        
01497                     btVector3 aabbMax(btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT));
01498                     btVector3 aabbMin(btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT),btScalar(-BT_LARGE_FLOAT));
01499                     //DebugDrawcallback drawCallback;
01500                     DebugDrawcallback drawCallback(getDebugDrawer(),worldTransform,color);
01501                     convexMesh->getMeshInterface()->InternalProcessAllTriangles(&drawCallback,aabbMin,aabbMax);
01502                 }
01503 
01504 
01505                 
01506             }
01507        
01508                 }
01509         }
01510 }

01513 void    btCollisionWorld::debugDrawWorld()
01514 {
01515         if (getDebugDrawer())
01516         {
01517                 getDebugDrawer()->clearLines();
01518 
01519                 btIDebugDraw::DefaultColors defaultColors = getDebugDrawer()->getDefaultColors();
01520 
01521                 if ( getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawContactPoints)
01522                 {
01523                 
01524 
01525                         if (getDispatcher())
01526                         {
01527                                 int numManifolds = getDispatcher()->getNumManifolds();
01528                         
01529                                 for (int i=0;i<numManifolds;i++)
01530                                 {
01531                                         btPersistentManifold* contactManifold = getDispatcher()->getManifoldByIndexInternal(i);
01532                                         //btCollisionObject* obA = static_cast<btCollisionObject*>(contactManifold->getBody0());
01533                                         //btCollisionObject* obB = static_cast<btCollisionObject*>(contactManifold->getBody1());
01534 
01535                                         int numContacts = contactManifold->getNumContacts();
01536                                         for (int j=0;j<numContacts;j++)
01537                                         {
01538                                                 btManifoldPoint& cp = contactManifold->getContactPoint(j);
01539                                                 getDebugDrawer()->drawContactPoint(cp.m_positionWorldOnB,cp.m_normalWorldOnB,cp.getDistance(),cp.getLifeTime(),defaultColors.m_contactPoint);
01540                                         }
01541                                 }
01542                         }
01543                 }
01544 
01545                 if ((getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode() & (btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawWireframe | btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawAabb)))
01546                 {
01547                         int i;
01548 
01549                         for (  i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
01550                         {
01551                                 btCollisionObject* colObj = m_collisionObjects[i];
01552                                 if ((colObj->getCollisionFlags() & btCollisionObject::CF_DISABLE_VISUALIZE_OBJECT)==0)
01553                                 {
01554                                         if (getDebugDrawer() && (getDebugDrawer()->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawWireframe))
01555                                         {
01556                                                 btVector3 color(btScalar(0.4),btScalar(0.4),btScalar(0.4));
01557 
01558                                                 switch(colObj->getActivationState())
01559                                                 {
01560                                                 case  ACTIVE_TAG:
01561                                                         color = defaultColors.m_activeObject; break;
01562                                                 case ISLAND_SLEEPING:
01563                                                         color =  defaultColors.m_deactivatedObject;break;
01564                                                 case WANTS_DEACTIVATION:
01565                                                         color = defaultColors.m_wantsDeactivationObject;break;
01566                                                 case DISABLE_DEACTIVATION:
01567                                                         color = defaultColors.m_disabledDeactivationObject;break;
01568                                                 case DISABLE_SIMULATION:
01569                                                         color = defaultColors.m_disabledSimulationObject;break;
01570                                                 default:
01571                                                         {
01572                                                                 color = btVector3(btScalar(.3),btScalar(0.3),btScalar(0.3));
01573                                                         }
01574                                                 };
01575 
01576                                                 colObj->getCustomDebugColor(color);
01577 
01578                                                 debugDrawObject(colObj->getWorldTransform(),colObj->getCollisionShape(),color);
01579                                         }
01580                                         if (m_debugDrawer && (m_debugDrawer->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawAabb))
01581                                         {
01582                                                 btVector3 minAabb,maxAabb;
01583                                                 btVector3 colorvec = defaultColors.m_aabb;
01584                                                 colObj->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(colObj->getWorldTransform(), minAabb,maxAabb);
01585                                                 btVector3 contactThreshold(gContactBreakingThreshold,gContactBreakingThreshold,gContactBreakingThreshold);
01586                                                 minAabb -= contactThreshold;
01587                                                 maxAabb += contactThreshold;
01588 
01589                                                 btVector3 minAabb2,maxAabb2;
01590 
01591                                                 if(getDispatchInfo().m_useContinuous && colObj->getInternalType()==btCollisionObject::CO_RIGID_BODY && !colObj->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
01592                                                 {
01593                                                         colObj->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(colObj->getInterpolationWorldTransform(),minAabb2,maxAabb2);
01594                                                         minAabb2 -= contactThreshold;
01595                                                         maxAabb2 += contactThreshold;
01596                                                         minAabb.setMin(minAabb2);
01597                                                         maxAabb.setMax(maxAabb2);
01598                                                 }
01599 
01600                                                 m_debugDrawer->drawAabb(minAabb,maxAabb,colorvec);
01601                                         }
01602                                 }
01603                         }
01604                 }
01605         }
01606 }
01607 
01608 
01609 void    btCollisionWorld::serializeCollisionObjects(btSerializer* serializer)
01610 {
01611         int i;
01612 
01614         btHashMap<btHashPtr,btCollisionShape*>  serializedShapes;
01615 
01616         for (i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
01617         {
01618                 btCollisionObject* colObj = m_collisionObjects[i];
01619                 btCollisionShape* shape = colObj->getCollisionShape();
01620 
01621                 if (!serializedShapes.find(shape))
01622                 {
01623                         serializedShapes.insert(shape,shape);
01624                         shape->serializeSingleShape(serializer);
01625                 }
01626         }
01627 
01628         //serialize all collision objects
01629         for (i=0;i<m_collisionObjects.size();i++)
01630         {
01631                 btCollisionObject* colObj = m_collisionObjects[i];
01632                 if ((colObj->getInternalType() == btCollisionObject::CO_COLLISION_OBJECT) || (colObj->getInternalType() == btCollisionObject::CO_FEATHERSTONE_LINK))
01633                 {
01634                         colObj->serializeSingleObject(serializer);
01635                 }
01636         }
01637 }
01638 
01639 
01640 void    btCollisionWorld::serialize(btSerializer* serializer)
01641 {
01642 
01643         serializer->startSerialization();
01644         
01645         serializeCollisionObjects(serializer);
01646         
01647         serializer->finishSerialization();
01648 }
